item.description:
Kayak/Canoe Flint Pond, Shrewsbury

Saturday, May 10 at 2:00

We'll meet at the Flint Pond State Boat Ramp on Rt. 20 in Shrewsbury, which is about 100 yards east of the Shrewsbury/Worcester line. The entrance to the boat ramp is at the traffic light at the intersection of Rt. 20 and Edgemere Blvd.

We'll paddle through the pond and into Lake Quinsigammond. We will be on the water for approximately 2 hours.

Reminder - PFDs are required for all kayaking/canoeing events. Anyone participating in a group kayaking/canoeing activity must have signed a waiver, and each participant is responsible for his or her own safety, as well as their equipment.
item.name: Kayak/Canoe Flint Pond, Shrewsbury
